definitions.definition: The act of aggrandizing, or the state of being aggrandized or exalted in power, rank, honor, or wealth; exaltation ; enlargement .
examples: The emperor seeks only the aggrandizement of his own family.

main_definition: The act of aggrandizing, or the state of being aggrandized or exalted in power, rank, honor, or wealth; exaltation ; enlargement .
